typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductionPeriod as date,
		{ParPrice_L_CAD/m3} as double,
		{ParPrice_M_CAD/m3} as double,
		{ParPrice_H_CAD/m3} as double,
		{ParPrice_UH_CAD/m3} as double,
		{C2RefPriceSpec_CAD/GJ} as double,
		{C3RefPriceMix_CAD/M3} as double,
		{C4RefPriceMix_CAD/M3} as double,
		{C5RefPriceMix_CAD/M3} as double,
		{C3RefPriceSpec_CAD/M3} as double,
		{C4RefPriceSpec_CAD/M3} as double,
		{C5RefPriceSpec_CAD/M3} as double,
		SysStartTime as string,
		SysEndTime as string,
		{C1ARP_CAD/GJ} as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> RFMCSVFile
RFMCSVFile select(mapColumn(
		ProductionPeriod,
		ParPrice_L_CAD_m3 = {ParPrice_L_CAD/m3},
		ParPrice_M_CAD_m3 = {ParPrice_M_CAD/m3},
		ParPrice_H_CAD_m3 = {ParPrice_H_CAD/m3},
		ParPrice_UH_CAD_m3 = {ParPrice_UH_CAD/m3},
		C2RefPriceSpec_CAD_GJ = {C2RefPriceSpec_CAD/GJ},
		C3RefPriceMix_CAD_M3 = {C3RefPriceMix_CAD/M3},
		C4RefPriceMix_CAD_M3 = {C4RefPriceMix_CAD/M3},
		C5RefPriceMix_CAD_M3 = {C5RefPriceMix_CAD/M3},
		C3RefPriceSpec_CAD_M3 = {C3RefPriceSpec_CAD/M3},
		C4RefPriceSpec_CAD_M3 = {C4RefPriceSpec_CAD/M3},
		C5RefPriceSpec_CAD_M3 = {C5RefPriceSpec_CAD/M3},
		C1ARP_CAD_GJ = {C1ARP_CAD/GJ}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ParPrice.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RFMOutFile
